messages: {42_login} just show up, hold my beer
{42_login} we hope you brought pizza, get them in {seat}
{42_login} just log in, where were you ?
{42_login} Who are you ? {seat} is a restricted seat only for 42 student
{42_login} how did it get so late so soon ({seat})
{42_login} I could tell that you're late but I prefer chronologically challenged. ({seat})
{42_login} do you know that fall into a spatio-temporal rift is not a pretext to be in late ?
{42_login} It's a miracle, come in {seat} to see this !
Wow {42_login}, I didn't expect to see you so soon...
Aaaaaand {42_login} break a new times the world record of the longest break !
